# crypto-data-aggregator

> Real-time cryptocurrency market data aggregator. Track 10,000+ coins, monitor 200+ DeFi protocols, manage portfolios, set price alerts, and analyze market sentiment, all in one place.

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/nirholas/crypto-data-aggregator
- Author: https://github.com/nirholas
- Full documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nirholas/crypto-data-aggregator/main/llms-full.txt
